items.sentence: Tom is probably going to tell Mary he's busy.
Tom is probably going to have fun doing that.
Tom is probably going to be safe where he is.
Tom is going to leave the day after tomorrow.
Tom has two sons. Both of them are teenagers.
Tom has been waiting in the lobby since 2:30.
Tom goes swimming three or four times a week.
Tom explained to me in detail how to do that.
Tom didn't look like he was enjoying himself.
Wasn't Tom supposed to go shopping with Mary?
